title: FS: t206 Mike Powers, SGC 50, great centering--SOLD
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: FS: t206 Mike Powers, SGC 50, great centering--SOLD
posts.post_content:
Terrific, well-centered SGC 50 for catcher Mike Powers, a tougher than average card and one of cooler looking ones in set.  $139 plus $3 mailing.    pp gift.  Weak scans below--borders are a lot cleaner than they look here.
